titles.title: Children Health Insurance Access Amendments of 1996

To amend the Public Health Service Act to assure the availability of health insurance coverage for children in the individual market in a manner similar to guaranteed availability of individual health insurance coverage for certain previously covered individuals under the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade, and Hazardous Materials.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/28/1996--Introduced. Children Health Insurance Access Amendments of 1996 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide for the guaranteed availability of individual health insurance coverage to uninsured children.
